properties.displayName: Potential DCOM InternetExplorer.Application DLL Hijack - Image Load
properties.query:
DeviceImageLoadEvents
| where FolderPath endswith "\\Internet Explorer\\iertutil.dll" and InitiatingProcessFolderPath endswith "\\Internet Explorer\\iexplore.exe"

tags.name: description
tags.value: Detects potential DLL hijack of "iertutil.dll" found in the DCOM InternetExplorer.Application Class
